name: Royal Tree Sherbet
description: Sherbet by Royal Tree Gardens is another genetically distinct strain under a familiar name. Royal Tree’s Sherbet cut is close to the original, crossing an unknown Purple Cookies with Platinum Girl Scout Cookies. This twice-deep mixture of Cookies genetics gives the plant a sweet, sugary aroma that is as alluring on the nose as it is on the palate. Sherbet provides a clear-headed and uplifting mental state, and a pleasant terpene profile that is sure to excite novice and seasoned consumers alike.
descriptionPlain: Sherbet by Royal Tree Gardens is another genetically distinct strain under a familiar name. Royal Tree’s Sherbet cut is close to the original, crossing an unknown Purple Cookies with Platinum Girl Scout Cookies. This twice-deep mixture of Cookies genetics gives the plant a sweet, sugary aroma that is as alluring on the nose as it is on the palate. Sherbet provides a clear-headed and uplifting mental state, and a pleasant terpene profile that is sure to excite novice and seasoned consumers alike.

highlightedReviews.text:
I had the opportunity to try on of the Royal Tree Sherbet cartridges recently and it was a real treat. 

Like all the Royal Tree products that I have tried the flavor was great. Their products always taste very "rich" to me - full flavored. 

Sherbet had a distinct woodsy taste kind of like a fine whiskey - if you have ever had the opportunity to sip some good stuff. There was a little citrus in the background as well. It drew well and was very smooth. No sharp or burnt taste at all and no coughing. 

If you have the opportunity to try it, I would give it a shot. It's great for a relaxing evening around the house.
